<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset distinguishes over 15,000 soil mapping units that combines existing regional and national updates of soil information worldwide (SOTER, ESD, Soil Map of China, WISE) with the scale FAO-UNESCO Soil Map of the World.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`salineSoils`|Mask of saline soils|
</div>
